mapper.select: SELECT od.id, od.lec_id AS lecId, od.ord_id AS ordId, od.stdy_hour AS stdyHour , l.lec_code AS lecCode, l.title AS lecTitle, l.teacher AS lecTeacher , l.topic AS lecTopic, l.target AS lecTarget, l.length AS lecLength , l.img AS img, o.stdn_id AS stdnId, s.name AS stdnName FROM ord_detail od, ord o, lec l, stdn s WHERE od.ord_id=o.id AND od.lec_id=l.id AND o.stdn_id=s.id AND o.stdn_id=#{stdnId}

SELECT od.id, od.lec_id AS lecId, od.ord_id AS ordId, od.stdy_hour AS stdyHour , l.lec_code AS lecCode, l.title AS lecTitle, l.teacher AS lecTeacher , l.topic AS lecTopic, l.target AS lecTarget, l.length AS lecLength , l.img AS img, o.stdn_id AS stdnId, s.name AS stdnName FROM ord_detail od, ord o, lec l, stdn s WHERE od.ord_id=o.id AND od.lec_id=l.id AND o.stdn_id=s.id AND od.id=#{id}
